Event.name: Socially_significant_history_scenario
Event.definition:
<def-root>A series of <fen>Event</fen>s are important to humankind and its culture.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Event
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the event which occurs to create history.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies where the event takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the time when the event occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way).</def-root>

Arg.name: Domain
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Domain</fen> is (a characterization of) the type of event that is part of the <fen>Event</fen>'s history. </def-root>
